alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Trego (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 5:55PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Trego and southwestern Ellis Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 555 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Ellis, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 30 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Riga around 610 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Cedar Bluff. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
